dict.string: MakeItHome accesses to your calendar to show your events in the widgets zone.
MakeItHome wants to write your new event on your Calendar.
MakeItHome accesses to your calendar to show your events in the widgets zone.
MakeItHome uses AppleEvents to retrieve some system information, like the background image.
MakeItHome need to check if you're the owner of your computer.
MakeItHome requires access to your camera for face recognition.
